qas.question: In what one way can videoconferencing help a person?
What technology can be used along with videoconferencing?
What is another use of VoIP?
What is the percentage of people who use videoconferencing a majority of the time?

plausible_answers.text: to participate in meetings on short notice

qas.question: What can time savings help people do?
What are face-to-face business meetings also used for?

plausible_answers.text: 54% of the respondents with access to video conferencing used it “all of the time” or “frequently”.

qas.question: What did a report based on money savings show?
As of June 2010 what  percentage of telecommuters used the technology frequently?
What are low-cost meetings also used for?

context: Videoconferencing can enable individuals in distant locations <b5_0>to participate in meetings on short notice<b5_0/>, with time and <a0_0>money savings<a0_0/>. Technology such as <a1_0>VoIP<a1_0/> can be used in conjunction with desktop videoconferencing to enable low-cost face-to-face business meetings without leaving the desk, especially for businesses with widespread offices. The technology is also used for <a2_0><b6_0>telecommuting<b6_0/><a2_0/>, in which employees <a3_0><b9_0>work from home<b9_0/><a3_0/>. One research report based on a sampling of 1,800 corporate employees showed that, as of June 2010, <a4_0><b7_0><b8_0>54%<b8_0/><a4_0/> of the respondents with access to video conferencing used it “all of the time” or “frequently”.
